en.auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
en.auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.

en.messages.home-header.description: In Menteeno, you are supposed to learn how to boost your skills in both your personal and professional life. With a personalized path, real training, an experienced mentor, and a growing community. It's for everyone who is looking for growth.
en.messages.home-header.title: Menteeno
en.messages.home-header.title-rotate.2: The space for skill development in the workplace

en.passwords.sent: We have emailed your password reset link.
en.passwords.token: This password reset token is invalid.
en.passwords.user: We can't find a user with that email address.

en.validation.accepted_if: The :attribute field must be accepted when :other is :value.
en.validation.active_url: The :attribute field must be a valid URL.
en.validation.after: The :attribute field must be a date after :date.
en.validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute field must be a date after or equal to :date.
en.validation.alpha: The :attribute field must only contain letters.
en.validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute field must only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
en.validation.alpha_num: The :attribute field must only contain letters and numbers.
en.validation.array: The :attribute field must be an array.
en.validation.ascii: The :attribute field must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
en.validation.before: The :attribute field must be a date before :date.
en.validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute field must be a date before or equal to :date.

between.array: The :attribute field must have between :min and :max items.
between.file: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.numeric: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max.
between.string: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max characters.

en.validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
en.validation.can: The :attribute field contains an unauthorized value.
en.validation.confirmed: The :attribute field confirmation does not match.
en.validation.contains: The :attribute field is missing a required value.
en.validation.date: The :attribute field must be a valid date.
en.validation.date_equals: The :attribute field must be a date equal to :date.
en.validation.date_format: The :attribute field must match the format :format.
en.validation.decimal: The :attribute field must have :decimal decimal places.
en.validation.declined_if: The :attribute field must be declined when :other is :value.
en.validation.different: The :attribute field and :other must be different.
en.validation.digits_between: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max digits.
en.validation.dimensions: The :attribute field has invalid image dimensions.
en.validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
en.validation.doesnt_contain: The :attribute field must not contain any of the following: :values.
en.validation.doesnt_end_with: The :attribute field must not end with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.doesnt_start_with: The :attribute field must not start with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.email: The :attribute field must be a valid email address.
en.validation.ends_with: The :attribute field must end with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.extensions: The :attribute field must have one of the following extensions: :values.
en.validation.file: The :attribute field must be a file.
en.validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.

gt.array: The :attribute field must have more than :value items.
gt.file: The :attribute field must be greater than :value kilobytes.
gt.numeric: The :attribute field must be greater than :value.
gt.string: The :attribute field must be greater than :value characters.

gte.array: The :attribute field must have :value items or more.
gte.file: The :attribute field must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.
gte.numeric: The :attribute field must be greater than or equal to :value.
gte.string: The :attribute field must be greater than or equal to :value characters.

en.validation.hex_color: The :attribute field must be a valid hexadecimal color.
en.validation.image: The :attribute field must be an image.
en.validation.in_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain at least one of the following keys: :values.
en.validation.integer: The :attribute field must be an integer.
en.validation.ip: The :attribute field must be a valid IP address.
en.validation.ipv4: The :attribute field must be a valid IPv4 address.
en.validation.ipv6: The :attribute field must be a valid IPv6 address.
en.validation.json: The :attribute field must be a valid JSON string.
en.validation.list: The :attribute field must be a list.

lt.array: The :attribute field must have less than :value items.
lt.file: The :attribute field must be less than :value kilobytes.
lt.numeric: The :attribute field must be less than :value.
lt.string: The :attribute field must be less than :value characters.

lte.array: The :attribute field must not have more than :value items.
lte.file: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
lte.numeric: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value.
lte.string: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value characters.

en.validation.mac_address: The :attribute field must be a valid MAC address.

max.array: The :attribute field must not have more than :max items.
max.file: The :attribute field must not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.numeric: The :attribute field must not be greater than :max.
max.string: The :attribute field must not be greater than :max characters.

en.validation.max_digits: The :attribute field must not have more than :max digits.
en.validation.mimes: The :attribute field must be a file of type: :values.

min.array: The :attribute field must have at least :min items.
min.file: The :attribute field must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.numeric: The :attribute field must be at least :min.
min.string: The :attribute field must be at least :min characters.

en.validation.min_digits: The :attribute field must have at least :min digits.
en.validation.missing_if: The :attribute field must be missing when :other is :value.
en.validation.missing_unless: The :attribute field must be missing unless :other is :value.
en.validation.missing_with: The :attribute field must be missing when :values is present.
en.validation.missing_with_all: The :attribute field must be missing when :values are present.
en.validation.multiple_of: The :attribute field must be a multiple of :value.
en.validation.numeric: The :attribute field must be a number.

password.letters: The :attribute field must contain at least one letter.
password.mixed: The :attribute field must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
password.numbers: The :attribute field must contain at least one number.
password.symbols: The :attribute field must contain at least one symbol.
password.uncompromised: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.

en.validation.present_if: The :attribute field must be present when :other is :value.
en.validation.present_unless: The :attribute field must be present unless :other is :value.
en.validation.present_with: The :attribute field must be present when :values is present.
en.validation.present_with_all: The :attribute field must be present when :values are present.

en.validation.prohibited_unless: The :attribute field is prohibited unless :other is in :values.
en.validation.prohibits: The :attribute field prohibits :other from being present.
en.validation.required_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain entries for: :values.

en.validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
en.validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
en.validation.starts_with: The :attribute field must start with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.string: The :attribute field must be a string.
en.validation.timezone: The :attribute field must be a valid timezone.
en.validation.ulid: The :attribute field must be a valid ULID.
en.validation.url: The :attribute field must be a valid URL.

fa.auth.failed: مشخصات وارد شده با اطلاعات ما سازگار نیست.
fa.auth.throttle: دفعات تلاش شما برای ورود بیش از حد مجاز است. لطفا پس از :seconds ثانیه مجددا تلاش فرمایید.

fa.messages.home-header.description: تو منتینو قراره یاد بگیری چطور مهارت‌هاتو توی زندگی و کار ارتقا بدی. با یه مسیر شخصی‌سازی‌شده، تمرین‌های واقعی، منتور حرفه‌ای و یه عالمه بازخورد سازنده. همه اینا کنار کسایی که مثل تو دنبال رشدن.
fa.messages.home-header.title: منتینو
fa.messages.home-header.title-rotate.2: فضای توسعه مهارت‌های نرم فضای کار
fa.messages.home-header.title-rotate.3: مهارت‌های نرم خود را دیباگ کنید

fa.passwords.sent: لینک بازگردانی رمز عبور به ایمیل شما ارسال شد.
fa.passwords.throttled: پیش از تلاش مجدد کمی صبر کنید.
fa.passwords.token: مشخصه‌ی بازگردانی رمز عبور معتبر نیست.
fa.passwords.user: ما کاربری با این نشانی ایمیل نداریم!

fa.validation.after_or_equal: :attribute باید تاریخی بعد از :date، یا مطابق با آن باشد.
fa.validation.alpha_dash: :attribute باید فقط حروف الفبا، اعداد، خط تیره و زیرخط باشد.
fa.validation.alpha_num: :attribute باید فقط حروف الفبا و اعداد باشد.
fa.validation.before_or_equal: :attribute باید تاریخی قبل از :date، یا مطابق با آن باشد.
fa.validation.boolean: فیلد :attribute فقط می‌تواند true و یا false باشد.
fa.validation.date_equals: :attribute باید یک تاریخ برابر با تاریخ :date باشد.
fa.validation.different: :attribute و :other باید از یکدیگر متفاوت باشند.
fa.validation.ends_with: فیلد :attribute باید با یکی از مقادیر زیر خاتمه یابد: :values

gt.array: :attribute باید بیشتر از :value آیتم داشته باشد.
gt.string: :attribute باید بیشتر از :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

gte.array: :attribute باید بیشتر یا مساوی :value آیتم داشته باشد.
gte.file: :attribute باید بزرگتر یا مساوی :value کیلوبایت باشد.
gte.string: :attribute باید بیشتر یا مساوی :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

fa.validation.ipv4: :attribute باید یک آدرس معتبر از نوع IPv4 باشد.
fa.validation.ipv6: :attribute باید یک آدرس معتبر از نوع IPv6 باشد.
fa.validation.json: فیلد :attribute باید یک رشته از نوع JSON باشد.

lt.array: :attribute باید کمتر از :value آیتم داشته باشد.
lt.string: :attribute باید کمتر از :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

lte.array: :attribute باید کمتر یا مساوی :value آیتم داشته باشد.
lte.file: :attribute باید کوچکتر یا مساوی :value کیلوبایت باشد.
lte.string: :attribute باید کمتر یا مساوی :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

max.array: :attribute نباید بیشتر از :max آیتم داشته باشد.
max.string: :attribute نباید بیشتر از :max کاراکتر داشته باشد.

min.array: :attribute نباید کمتر از :min آیتم داشته باشد.
min.string: :attribute نباید کمتر از :min کاراکتر داشته باشد.

fa.validation.numeric: :attribute باید عدد یا رشته‌ای از اعداد باشد.
fa.validation.present: فیلد :attribute باید در پارامترهای ارسالی وجود داشته باشد.
fa.validation.required_if: هنگامی که :other برابر با :value است، فیلد :attribute الزامی است.
fa.validation.required_unless: فیلد :attribute الزامی است، مگر آنکه :other در :values موجود باشد.
fa.validation.required_with: در صورت وجود فیلد :values، فیلد :attribute نیز الزامی است.
fa.validation.required_with_all: در صورت وجود فیلدهای :values، فیلد :attribute نیز الزامی است.
fa.validation.required_without: در صورت عدم وجود فیلد :values، فیلد :attribute الزامی است.
fa.validation.required_without_all: در صورت عدم وجود هر یک از فیلدهای :values، فیلد :attribute الزامی است.
fa.validation.starts_with: :attribute باید با یکی از این ها شروع شود: :values
fa.validation.timezone: فیلد :attribute باید یک منطقه زمانی معتبر باشد.
